translations.translation: Ordering an MX PLAN
In order to configure an MX plan, you need at least one domain.
1. MX Plan configuration
Domain
Type of sevice
An error has occurred recovering your order details ({0}).
2. Select a service
For more information, please see our product descriptions. {2}
An error has occurred while retrieving the available durations.
An error has occurred searching for available prices for this duration.
When you pay for the order, the service will become attached to your domain name without a renewal request.
3. Validation
I confirm that I have read and understood the Terms & conditions.
Click on "Generate the purchase order" to order your MX Plan.
Please read and confirm the terms and conditions below, then click "Generate the purchase order":
Generate purchase order
Generating purchase order...
The purchase order has been generated.
To confirm your order, please click the "Pay" button below.
Pay
A new tab will open, and you will be automatically redirected to the OVH payment interface.
An error has occurred generating the purchase order.
